paragraphs: Customizing the branding of your kiosk application is a straightforward process that significantly enhances the customer experience by ensuring brand consistency across different venues. By following the steps outlined, you can easily update logos, colors, and images from a centralized location, with changes reflected instantly within the kiosk interface.

FAQ.answer: You can customize the Logo, Primary Color, Secondary Color (for text), a Tagline, and a Hero Image to be displayed in the kiosk interface.
FAQ.question: What specific branding elements can I customize for the kiosk?

FAQ.answer: Yes, the branding settings are applied on a per-venue basis. You must select a specific venue to which the branding customizations will apply, allowing for unique branding at different locations.
FAQ.question: Can I apply different branding settings for different store locations or venues?

FAQ.answer: The system provides a real-time preview panel, typically on the right side of the screen. As you make changes to the branding options, this panel updates to show you exactly how the kiosk interface will look before you save.
FAQ.question: How can I see my branding changes before they are applied?

FAQ.answer: After you have finished customizing the branding elements and are satisfied with the preview, you must click the 'Save' button to apply the updates to the selected venue's kiosk.
FAQ.question: What is the final step to make my branding changes live?

paragraphs: This guide provides detailed instructions on how to customize the branding of your Kiosk application. The Branding section in the administrative console allows you to tailor the visual appearance of the kiosk to align with your brand identity. These settings can be applied to specific venues, ensuring a consistent and personalized experience for your customers.
outcomes: Locate the Kiosk branding settings within the console.
Understand the different customization options available.
Upload a custom logo and hero image.
Set the primary and secondary colors for the kiosk theme.
Apply and save branding changes for a specific venue.
prerequisites: Valid login credentials for the administrative console.
User role with permissions to access and modify Branding settings.
Digital assets (logo, hero image) prepared in a supported format.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Begin by accessing the main administrative portal where all settings are managed.
Steps / How-To.step: Log in to the console with your user credentials.

Steps / How-To.explanation: The branding options are located within the main settings area of the console.
Steps / How-To.step: Navigate to the 'Settings' section, and then select 'Branding'.

Steps / How-To.explanation: From the list of applications that support branding, you need to choose the kiosk.
Steps / How-To.step: Select the 'Kiosk' application from the available options.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Branding is applied at a venue level, allowing for different branding at different locations.
Steps / How-To.step: Choose the specific venue where you want to apply the new branding settings from the dropdown menu.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Upload your company's logo to be displayed on the kiosk interface. This is a key part of your brand identity.
Steps / How-To.step: In the 'Logo' section, click the upload button to select and upload a custom logo file for the selected venue.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Set the main theme color for the kiosk. This color will be used for primary UI elements like headers and buttons.
Steps / How-To.step: In the 'Primary Color' section, select a color that defines the kiosk's main theme.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Choose a contrasting color for text to ensure it is readable against the primary color.
Steps / How-To.step: In the 'Secondary Color (Text Color)' section, select a color for the text elements.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter a short, memorable phrase that will be displayed on the kiosk interface to reinforce your brand message.
Steps / How-To.step: In the 'Tagline' field, enter a short tagline to be displayed in the kiosk interface.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Upload a large, high-quality background or banner image to enhance the visual appeal of the kiosk's main screen.
Steps / How-To.step: In the 'Hero Image' section, click the upload button to select and upload a hero image.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Before finalizing your changes, use the live preview to ensure all elements appear as expected.
Steps / How-To.step: Review your branding updates in the real-time preview panel on the right side of the screen.

Steps / How-To.explanation: To make your new branding settings active for the selected venue's kiosk, you must save your work.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the 'Save' button to apply the branding updates.
